paragraphs.text: Stop. You should stop. You should be kinder to people.

paragraphs.text: Start mentioning luck folks. Call luck what it is. Pull the luck stick and point it at all those people you’re quoting.

paragraphs.name: de78
paragraphs.text: Wow. This is awesome. I’ve been hella overwhelmed from everything you’re mentioning here. Attempting to understand the entrepreneurial game is exhausting, and the internet feels incredibly vast and untrustworthy when you’re standing at the edge of it trying to find a way in.

content.subtitle: What reliable and trustworthy resources have you used or recommended in the past?

virtuals.subtitle: What reliable and trustworthy resources have you used or recommended in the past?

paragraphs.name: a34c
paragraphs.text: It is intentionally written like that. Your version is probably better :) but I don’t want it better. I mean it is not ok to be X and to do Y at the same time. :) Thanks!

9df70b01b015.title: It is intentionally written like that.

paragraphs.text: The fact is, there is no easy way out. Certain content is targeted at systems wired for survival and exploited for emotional response, and this is the world we live in.

paragraphs.name: 745a
paragraphs.text: Here are two things about the fake news phenomenon:

paragraphs.name: c659
paragraphs.text: It IS luck. There are tons more people out there better than me who haven’t gotten the opportunities I have. Who knows if there’s some other type of Elon Musk out there waiting tables? It’s luck!

paragraphs.name: 42b1
paragraphs.text: You’ve addressed things I’ve scratched my head about for so long! I’ve not been exactly prolific when it comes to manifesting dreams, but the dreams belong to the dreamer and the dreamer must be the accountable recipient — sure help is great IF you can find ‘real’ help. Mostly, it’s an inside job. Thanks for the read.

e74f9ed85cd2.title: You’ve addressed things I’ve scratched my head about for so long!

paragraphs.name: 42f0
paragraphs.text: Savage and something I’ve been guilty of in the past but have gotten better about. I come from a family that talks big about hustle and entrepreneurship but don’t have the technical background to back it up. It left me in a worse off place because I grew up feeling entitled to not have a job, but lacking the ACTUAL skills to be a legit entrepreneur…

583001d86f7b.title: Savage and something I’ve been guilty of in the past but have gotten better about.

paragraphs.name: ef5b
paragraphs.text: This is wonderful. I feel like you are saying what I want to say and promptly wrote, then deleted yesterday, after being embarrassed about it. How ‘having it all’ and multitasking my 100 daily checklist burnt me out and was making me dig my own grave. And here I am after having a panic attack this morning and being sick to my stomach, trying to do…

content.subtitle: They certainly are NOT being kind.

paragraphs.name: f57e
paragraphs.text:
What a verbose waste of time. I just pissed away four precious minutes of my life reading this garbage advising me to what? get a factory job? Aspire to be a shoe salesman? 
I’ve bought into the dream job-situation-opportunity and been crushed and yes, it was a beast to get over, but what the actual fuck is your message here? I’m not a stupid person…
